meanings.sent1: Her noninterest in the movie was evident by her constant yawning.
meanings.sent2: The student's noninterest in the subject made it challenging to engage them in class.
meanings.sent3: His noninterest in the gossip around the office often left him out of the loop.
meanings.sent4: The cat's noninterest in the toy was a stark contrast to the dog's excitement.
meanings.sent5: The noninterest of the audience was palpable as the speaker droned on.

meanings.sent1: The noninterest account was suitable for those looking to avoid fees.
meanings.sent2: The bank offered a noninterest loan to help those in need.
meanings.sent3: The noninterest credit card was a popular choice for budget-conscious consumers.
meanings.sent4: Her noninterest savings account was a safe place to store her money.
meanings.sent5: The noninterest policy of the company was a relief for many customers.
